title: Drawing, "Design for Pin-Pendant with Color Notes", ca. 1965–70
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on index card
inscribed: Lower center in ball point pen: "Color: / Red / Green Elsa Freund / turq /* with navy blue glaze / (white under colors)"; at lower right in black ink: "(Pin-Pendant)"
description: Biomorphic shape wrapped in ribbon-like loops.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Pin-Pendant with Color Notes", ca. 1965–70.
ca. 1965–70. Pen and black ink, graphite on index card. Gift of Elsa Freund. 1992-107-1.
